description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Microsoft Edge memory corruption vulnerability (CVE-2024-38207):

1. Update Microsoft Edge to the latest version, ensuring you are running build number **128.0.2739.42** or later.
2. Restart Microsoft Edge after the update to fully implement the changes.

**Details**:
- This update mitigates a memory corruption issue that could allow remote code execution. Ensure your system is connected to the internet to facilitate the update process through Microsoft Update or download the latest version directly from the [official Microsoft Edge website](https://www.microsoft.com/edge).

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure you are running a compatible version of Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based). Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
